Acq.) 2013 2014 2014 2014 2014 (in millions) Change in gross profit $ 61.2 $ 84.2 $103.5 $117.5 $131.8 Change in freight-adjusted revenues 104.8 133.5 168.5 181.1 200.5 58% 63% 61% 65% 66% Aggregates segment gross profit margin as a percentage of freight-adjusted revenues is not a GAAP measure. We present Aggregates segment gross profit margin as a percentage of freight-adjusted revenues as it is consistent with the basis by which we review our operating results. We believe that this presentation is more meaningful to our investors as it excludes related transportation revenues (a pass-through activity) and other service-related revenues, such as landfill tipping fees.
